content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were driving home and we were about to turn right onto a road near his home when we both happened to be looking out the front windshield of my car and saw a larger than a star object that was bright white just fall straight down from where it was in the sky... we could not see the horizon line because the object was far away and trees blocked our view. we drove into his neighborhood and parked the car and continued to star out at the sky. i saw an second object that looked the same but appeared to have a different colored light as well do the same thing, fall fast, except this one was at more of a diagonal than straight down. could have been the same object, but unknown. i have seen shooting stars and this was not one. it was my first ufo experience and it was unbelievable. several planes and helicopters entered the sky afterwards, two helicopters side by side with bright lights very close overhead, looked as if they were searching. very suspicious.
content.summary: Bright white sphere-like object dropped straight down from sky

content.detailedDescription: The aliens raped me straight up and yelled gang bang more than once i kind of liked it
content.summary: The ufo was big

content.detailedDescription: Driving to a store with a friend, i noticed a red light out the passenger window. we stopped and watched an object do the most amazing turns, stops and accelerations i have ever seen. there is no way on earth that the human race has ever made an object that can do what this thing did !        i was with one of my best friends who happens to be a pastor at a popular church and when i asked him what he thinks it was, he said, all i am supposed to believe is that it was a cheribem or a fallen angel of some sort. but i know and he does also what we really saw....It came from mexico sky`s toward us at a speed so fast if you closed your eyes for two seconds it would have been there. it stopped, went right, left, forward, back etc... then, i swear to you, it went back towards mexico, from oc. calif. in less than 5 seconds.
content.summary: Unbelievable

content.detailedDescription:
I had gone into the walgreens store to buy some christmas lights.

when i left the store about 5:08 pm on 12/11/12 to get in my car, i looked to my right (to the east)
and noticed a formation of seven lights in the sky.  at first i thought of helicopters but there was no sound and the lights were not white, they had a yellow orange glow.  they were moving rapidly but i heard no sound.   they were traveling to the north west.  at their closest, they appeared to be spheres that glowed.  they made no sound.

another customer left the store.  i pointed to the sky and asked him if he thought they were airplanes.  he said no they were some sort of ufos.  they were then out of sight and i got in my car at 5:16 pm and drove home.

12/12 i reported what i saw to the wildwood police and at their suggestion to the faa.  

i have good vision.  i live near the spirit of st. louis airport and frequently watch aircraft during the day and night they pass over our home.  i have never in my life saw anything like what i saw on 12/11/12.
content.summary: Please see the detailed description

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was at the whispering pines park, in port st. lucie, fl.  (link moved to fi box) cms 12/12/11 12:27 cst flg here's the link to the park's website.  i was taking pictures of what i believe are chemical trails in the atmosphere.

2.  i sent the photos to my friend and he spotted an anomaly in two of them.

3.  who knows?

4.  well, in a very short time it had to have traveled a large distance, and was very high up.  also, it turned the area around it a bright orange/red.

5.  i did not notice anything during the time i was taking the pictures.  upon  further scrutiny, i don't know what they are.  i simply know that they are in my photos.  i want to find out what it is as well.

6.  never knew it was there at the time.  had i known, i would have sent the kids to the playground and taken photos as long as possible.
content.summary: This goes with my earlier report. i thought to include the whole series of photos taken, in chronological order.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to check some food i was cooking on my grill at exactly 8:00pm. i noticed that it was much brighter than earlier because the moon was visible in the ne sky (the cloud cover had mostly cleared). as i was looking northward to see how much the cloud cover had cleared, i noticed a bright orangish light become visible over/between some houses to the nnw of mine. the light was intensely orange, but not like a flare or roman candle, roughly roundish in shape, and initially was about the size of a pencil eraser held at arm's length (roughly a quarter-inch in diameter). it initially attracted my attention because it was much brighter than the usual planes and helicopters that fly overhead, and because of the odd color which was unlike the usual air traffic.

the light appeared to arc upwards and towards me before moving parallel eastward, visible above two houses across the street, then gained altitude and disappeared (growing smaller until not visible) at an angle upwards and to the north. it was visible for approximately two minutes, moving at a slow, steady pace. as the light moved eastward, it became more yellow-orange in color (though orange was still the primary color) and seemed to strobe slightly or perhaps flicker like flame.

when i first saw the light, i watched it for 20-30 seconds before backing up on my deck to the door and yelling for my wife to come see it too. she arrived promptly and was able to view it for approximately 45 seconds. we went back in the house at 8:04pm after spending roughly 60 seconds after it disappeared watching to see if anything else became visible.

after thinking about it overnight, i suppose the object could have been a chinese lantern. the light "flickered" but never looked like flame and seemed a lot brighter than a candle relative to its distance, but i suppose it could have been a glow inside a paper bag. the apparent direction (southeast, east, then north) could have been an illusion and the actual direction more of a straight eastward arc with the light burning brightly at first (thus larger), then lessening (thus seeming to move northwards). however, if so the launch was pretty much a failure (the lantern would have risen in one neighborhood and burned out in another a mile or so apart).
content.summary: Bright orange light seen over belton neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: Continue from short description....////  the car we were in we were out of our mind scared then as fast as it appeared it was with the others over the dump.The car was started and we started to leave when frank who was in the back seat looked back to see all the objects come together as one and light the sky as if it was day light for a second or two.Then a beam appeared on the hood of the car.The radeo was not on but made noise,and lights in the car fluttered. this was a long time ago so some of the event is not as clear as i wish it to be.I did report this to the branford ct.P.D.The next day.They were not so understanding,although i was one of many that reported the objects over the branford dump.I would take any polygraph test given to me regarding this factual story.I am 45 yrs. old now and have been holding on to this for all of this time.Kinda feels good to tell it to "some" who may believe what i say is the truth.I only tell people closest to me these things. so thanks for this sight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Myself and 3 friends were at a quarry 1/4 mile fron the town dump and witnessed 4 to 5 multy colored glowing oval shapes darting back and forth and casting what looked like lazer beams at eachother. one then came at us in the blink of an eye and was above

content.detailedDescription: I first spotted what looked like a huge flock of birds in north-west sky that were traveling east. something was odd about the "flock" as what appeared as grey chevron shapes started glowing and morphed into spheres randomly, then the "flock" seemed to grow in number as they came closer. i pointed it out to my husband and he saw it to. we were both gob smacked and then noticed another smaller swarm appear from the north and join the original swarm. they were glowing at different rates, appearing to spin, almost like reflections of the sun on the surface. we kept saying it can't be birds it doesn't make sense. they hovered above us for about a minute, long enough for us to pray the "our father" prayer, we weren't scared just curious. as the swarm flew above us we knew it wasn't a flock of birds. they were very high up in the sky, at the elevation of an airplane. most were traveling in a straight line together in a formation, while some were switching places with others zig-zag within the "flock". they went to the east and began to disappear at the rate of about 20 crafts per second. to me it seemed they ascended up into the atmosphere out of our view. then they were gone.
content.summary: Swarm-fleet of 50+ morphing glowing sphere ufos

content.detailedDescription: It was very early morning , i woke up to look at my boy freind lookin out sliding glass window in bedroom , i asked what are u looking at , he said a light  way out  3 blocks  out in the woods , i saw same thing for about 10 minunets, then it moved closer we could see colored lights very faint . white red green yellow i think iy happened so fast after he lihjt out in thr wood saw very still for a while , once it moved it stayed over the house only seamed for a second ,then gone so fast , i said to my boyfriend wrf was that...No noise , no shaking no nothing but what we saw . we boyh ran to the front of the house is when we saw it take off to quick to try to even think about gettin a camara .... i know what i saw . it was not a plane  , or anything hand made ,, 20 years or more i saw some that looked the same an i called my g friend to have her look out side i was about the same thing i saw in dec, 2011 in pike county ... i do have to say i am scared .. i feel like i as taken at one time .. i dont know how to explain , just something i feel deep inside me .....Amd i am noy crazy , nuts , on drugs , drinks ,, i am straigt very normal person .. maby a bed writer about that ....
content.summary: Lights in woods ,over the tree tops , then it moved stayed over house for a second . the took off like it was never there . no noise

content.detailedDescription: Looking up at stars, and then thought i saw a plane, but it never moved, so i thought it was a star or planet, but i could see lights moving on it, spoke to a neighborm, they see the lights moving too and the object just hovering, there are two of them, had my husband look, he saw it and said it might be a plane, but in the same spot for voer 20 minutes,  told a neighbor to go look and she sees them too.  gives same description of lights just hovering.
content.summary: Looking up at stars, and then thought i saw a plane, but it never moved, so i thought it was a star or planet, but i could see lights moving on it, spoke to a neighborm, they see the lights moving too and the object just hovering, there are two of them,

content.detailedDescription: Witness was driving south on i55 approaching route 30 when object was witnessed out the front windshield towards the passenger side. direction estimated to be predominantly south, maybe 20 degrees to the west. witness observed a bright sphere/orb descending (falling) very fast at a steep angle (almost straight down) over a period of about a second. witness thought in that instant that object was a meteor or debris but became surprised at next movement. object's descent then came top abrupt halt at about 50 degrees above horizon, moved to the right (west) appearing to hop twice then stopped again. object then got very bright and almost appeared to give an aura and then disappeared. entire event only lasted about 4 or 5 seconds. commercial airliners were noticed afterwards, although it is common to see those in my area. this is my first time seeing a possible ufo, although i am wide open to other explanations.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orb-like object feel fast, then stopped, changed direction, stopped, then got very bright and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a witness reporting for the main witness which called me on the phone and made me aware of the ship in the air. we live near each other. there were several witnesses. everyone is terrified. please contact and allow me to get everyone together that saw it for you to speak with ,all at the same time.. guys .... were scared ... the vehicle was putting a dark  black cloud out for miles behind it. we may have all been gassed by something. the really crazy thing was that last week 5 chinook helicopters flew into everett and parked over by my friends house, and when the vehicle was moving thru out the area ...... the five chinook choppers were escorting it... but they stayed about 1/4 mile away on the points and sides of the craft.... until at one point one of them did something i have never heard about ever before in my life.You won't believe it and i still don't know how the damn thing did it ! guys and gals ... we have so much to tell you .... you have got to believe us !!!!  something terrible is about to happen. one witness saw a blue creature outside of his house after flashing his flash lite at the ship   . . . _ _ _ . . . the universal sos in morse. another witness is this 90 year old lady who lives ...Well never mind that.... but she was in her house as several of the smaller craft were seen all around. they were yellow blue and red lights flying everywhere so when one of the witnesses goes home his grandmother asked him if he had been out in the back yard watching all the pretty lights.He asked her what lights and she said the red, blue, and yellow ones that keep flying around in the back yard. so now he's afraid that maybe they know he saw them. unfortunately none of us had a camera. i could not believe it but my cell doesn't even have one but please say someone got a pic of it here. surely we cant be the only ones to have seen this ...It was waaaayyy to big !!! absolutely no press please. if you report this to the govt. or anyone that has anything to do with them please leave our names out. please ..... we trust very few people now ... we don't want any trouble from anyone. we just want to tell you what we saw and sort of just disappear ya know?

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Pyrimid shape black .... huge ...... approx. 7 to 10 football fields in  diam.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:00pm est, my teenage son was alarmed by the sight of a colorful, star-like object that was moving at incredible speeds.  he had already observed it for about an hour before coming to me.  when i first saw it, i was shocked because i had never seen anything like this in my lifetime.  after only a couple minutes of looking at it, i immediately grabbed my digital camera and took 2 videos and then several pictures.  i went inside and downloaded the images and i took some time to crop the photos and zoom in on them.  my son and i were surprised that after all that time, the object was still out there so i took more pictures of it.  after looking at the second set of pictures, the object was either gone or no longer visible.  these pictures have been cropped - absolutley no editing other than that and i have all the originals.  i do have video from that night as well that i will provide if needed.  a friend suggested that i download the pics and video on this website. i was and still am astonished.  so after that i made sure to look in the area, every night, to see if 'it' would come back and to my amazement, lastnight, it did which i will be detailing in my next report.
content.summary: Star-like object, flickering, multi-colored, moving at incredible speeds, stayed in general vicinity, visible to 4 witnesses for over 2 hours

content.detailedDescription:
We were on our deck waiting for the stars to come out and looking up when we saw a cigar shaped, dark grey, silent craft move across the sky in a straight path. 
it had no lights at all. so it wasn't a plane or helicopter or anything the faa would regulate.
we know where the planes land and take off for bob hope international and it was not anywhere near that area. 
if it hadn't been for the little bit of light left from the setting sun we would've never seen it.
we immediately knew it wasn't anything we'd ever seen before.

it was just after 5:30pm in los angeles. near the 101 and barham.
it went from the southwest to the northeast. it went directly over universal studios and through their big beacon/spot llights. when it passed through the light it refracted it and looked like something moving in water, not light! it was moving too fast to be a blimp. it was completely silent so it wasn't a helicopter. they pass over the house often and are so loud they rattle our windows.

it was a cylinder shape. it flew with the longer side leading and the short ends were up and down. and the craft was at a slight angle from where we saw it.

upon seeing the craft we were not scared or frightened. just excited and bewildered. 

we lost sight of it as it continued on its path towards the northeast. our deck faces straight west with partial views of the north and south. so once the craft went beyond universal studios we could no longer see it.
content.summary: Dark, silent, cigar shaped craft flew over los angeles, near barham and 101.

content.detailedDescription: Mind you it's winter here in ny so 5pm comes around and its already very dark here. so i was taking my dog for a walk at about 5pm, on my way in i saw a plane in the sky that drew my attention, then coming down is what i thought a shooting star that crossed paths with the plane. it keeps slowly flying across the sky downwards as the plane flies into the distance, but then the thing just stops and pulsates a light and starts going up suddenly! then it flew to the right and i watched it for about 10 minutes just staring in suspicion. and then after i had been watching it slowly move in a straight line, it stopped moving and just started bouncing slightly, or what appeared as it "shaking". i just stopped staring and came in, quite freaked out.
content.summary: at first i thought it was a shooting star,m but then it stopped and flew up and then to the right and its direction changed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the n. side of my house talking on the phone wirh a friend i haven't talked to in years.I was looking at what i thought (to the n.)was a airplane with its' landing lights on,coming towards me.I did not get excited until it was about 50-100 ft. over me and it was so bright i could'nt 
 tell what it was. it made no noise. it lit up the forest floor.It emitted fangs of pure white light and i had to put up my hand to shade its' glare.I followed it down the side of my house and was waiting for it to emerge from the branches of my trees overhead and it had vanished. that is the second one of the summer. the first one was further away put it observed the 2nd ones flight characteristics. the 1st one was busted observing us(humans) until i noticed it and it moved on.All are silent and glow white.The 1st one acted like a star until i looked at it .Then it moved to the s.,it turned s. over my property.About 2 monthes ago i accidently dropped a tree onto my power lines and as i was looking at the lines with a vol. fireman ,another one was watching us until we looked at it and it tried to hide from our view by ducking behind line of sight tree braches. it zigged and zagged all over the place. i went to see where it had gone and it was gone. so that is 3 iv'e seen and 1 for a vol. fireman. if it our govt., why would the waste their time obseving civlians? i've had a total of 4 in my life. the 1st one really scared me,but not anymore. to me unless they screw with me they are like any other form of technology,albiet highly advanced.If anyone out there wants to buy me a battery for my cam-corder i'd eventually score some hardcore up-close flying mechanism for history!!
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very,very bright!

content.detailedDescription: I could not sleep so i went downstairs. i looked out the window as i walked down the hall and i noticed a strange pulsating blue and red lights. i wondered if it were a star or satellite so i stopped and stared. the lights were in an arc shape and they hovered. i watched for a long time because i could not believe what i was seeing. i kept trying to rule out possible answers other than ufo. after a while the lights moved quickly in a zig zag pattern and disappeared. i could not longer see the lights because of trees.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strange lights in distance

content.detailedDescription: It was about a quarter after 3, and i was out in the middle of nowhere with my grandmother in idaho. i was just waking up, and she was outside looking at something. i asked her what she was looking at, and she motioned for me to look at the sky. it was fairly cool outside, so i decided that i would hang out of the window. what i saw amazed me. i saw a large disc-like object hovering in the night sky, too bright to be a star. all of a sudden, it quickly accelerated to unknown speeds, then stopped, and sort of started to do loops in the sky, then as i started to get out my digital camera, it flashed and disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Floated around, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I am a 23 year old student. i was driving at 12 15 am on december 8th 2011 when i saw something that can't be explained. i was approaching a red light preparing to make a left at a four way intersection. as i stopped three large, yellow lights appeared in what was, only a second ago, a dark winter night sky. these lights were the same size, and were side by side in a horizontal line. there were no lights that would give away the location of an aircraft nearby, like blinking lights on a helicopter. these three lights literally appeared out of no where, they were only a few hundred feet in front of me and were no more than 200 feet in the sky. when the lights illuminated, it was clear they were a part of a larger "craft". the craft itself was triangular in shape. i couldn't make out any significant detail on the craft, but its shape and size were unmistakable. the three lights were at least 80-100 feet in length from one end to the other, and about 40 feet from top to bottom. the lights were a brilliant white/yellow color. they did not blink, pulsate, or illuminate the surrounding area, rather just illuminated and stayed solid. the lights were facing me directly, as if i was looking at the rear of the "craft". once the lights illuminated they paused for one second without moving the slightest bit, and then the "craft" shot off in an eastward trajectory at a 30-45 degree angle into the night sky. i was listening to my car radio at the time with my windows up so i couldn't detect any sound, but something accelerating at that speed so close to the ground must have made some kind of noise, i would assume. this event happened very close to multiple residences and if it was a jet or something of that nature than it would've made an ear piercing sound. the craft accelerated at an impossible speed traveling miles in only a few seconds. it left a yellow trail from each side that dissipated as the "craft" moved, then simply disappeared. the entire event, from when the lights first illuminated until it disappeared lasted about 5 seconds, but it felt as if time stood still. whatever this was, it was flying low to the ground in a highly populated area at night. the acceleration of this object from a standstill was jaw dropping, it went from a few hundred feet from my car to miles away in seconds and then was just gone. the immense size and speed of it, and it being so close to the ground was frightening to say the least. i can't help but feel like i saw something i wasn't supposed to, and it can't be explained. upon further investigation on my part there is a hill only about 300 feet away from the stoplight and there are power lines that run along it. the lights appeared in between me and the hill, and disappeared over the hill and out of sight. i contacted the local air traffic control and was transferred to a man who had authority there. he did not dismiss my report or call me crazy, but instead listened to what i had to report. he told me that it didn't fit the description of anything they know of, and also assured me that nothing abnormal was picked up on the radar. he said there was a good chance that what i saw would go unanswered, and assured me that neither i nor the local residents had anything to worry about. while i can't know how many phone calls they receive of this nature, the man certainly didn't dismiss my claims and seemed honest and genuine with his answers. if this was military in nature than i must say i would feel a huge relief. knowing that our military possess technology like this would make me feel more safe and secure, and if they did keeping it a secret is completely understood. if this is not military in nature than i will continue to feel unsure of my safety. i have absolute confidence in our military, and hope, for all of our sakes, that what i saw is of military origin. if it is not then many things i once considered debatable are now unmistakable. when an event of this magnitude happens right in front of you it's impossible to avoid or dismiss it. what i saw was 100% real and not a single bit of information i provided is false.
content.summary: Three large lights appear very close to the ground and accelerate at an impossible speed

content.detailedDescription: Some nights before bed i open the window for fresh air and stargaze for a few minutes. i try to name planets, constllations, ect. three weeks ago i see a an object slightly pulsating and hovering high enough that at first you think its a helicopter but it was there for hours at a time and appeared 2-3 times a week. and it didnt twinkle like the other stars did. living close to newark air port i've seen my share of planes and helicopters. looking at it with a childrens beginner telescope its as if you roll up white christmas lights in a ball and turn them on. its a white sphere with small white flashing lights in the middle.I stared for hours and its still there when i go to bed. it also appears that the stars and planets move on their normal orbit but the object stays in the same spot in the sky. i think its pretty cool but my wife  and kids are like big deal.
content.summary: White pulsating sphere with white twinkling lights in the middle.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down east willock rd notice bright light in the sky. as i kept on driving down that rd which it leads to street run rd i notice this thing was not moving at all. it took me 4 to 5 minutes to get to the actually spot that it was hovering on dalwar rd as i got under it i notice it was silent and huge with 3 lights that were like a yellowish white color it look to be like a boomerang / triangle shape to it as i was under it. it moved so slow i didn't take my eyes off it at all that's when i only saw the left side of its shape it was a dark object huge. it was a very clear night it moved so slow then it disappeared which there were no clouds where i was at this time i also was the only car on that rd at the time which was weird its a busy st it was 9:20 pm on november 7 2011.. please call me i have had a total of 3 other things that happened that was very weird in the past that i just can't explain in writing. now that i saw a ufo i can't stop thinking about them weird things that happened before ...
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed a bright light outside my window. my dogs ears had perked, and his fur was on end. the cat was standing horrifically at the window, frozen. (not literally, just really scared)i looked out the window and saw a huge saucer hovering 15 feet in the air. the grass and trees looked like a helicopter was near them. none of the neighbors knew what i was talking about when i told them later. it hovered, spraying bright light over the neighborhood. i could see my street perfectly because of the light. then i knew i had to record this. so, i grabbed the nearest pen and  magazine (not the best choice for writing on)and recorded the time. that was all i needed to record. i would remember the rest for the rest of my life. (oh, and also, don't call my house, or try to reach me at anyplace but my e-mail)




                             







































































































































































































































































































































































jaoogakayooga
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It hovered in the sky, moving around and making the the grass and trees look as if a helicopter was landing

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the road near my home. i looked up the sky. it was a clear december sky. the moon was shining bright on the east. i was walking towards west. towards the south-west direction i saw two stars. in between the two stars i saw another "star-like" object. it was bright red. suddenly it started blinking fast. it was blinking from red to white and white to red. i kept on watching it and then it suddenly started moving in random direction. i have never seen any earthly object change its position so rapidly. it was doing this for some time and then it suddenly vanished after 15 minutes. i felt amazed and thrilled as this was my first u.F.O experience.
content.summary: It looked like a star but changed direction spontaneously and randomly, blinked fast.

content.detailedDescription: While traveling east on honolulu in la crescenta ca i noticed what i thought was a very bright star 3 seconds later i thought it was a helo because it was about a mile away hovering or going very slow headed west. seconds later red and white flashing lights came on in sets at 100-200 feet from one another. i came to a stop and observed what looked like a jet as it passed over head. as it passed over i noticed that the jet was only one third the size of the area that it was blocking from my view, stars and radio towers mostly. the jet looked like a picture you would show a person who has never seen one before, just a basic outline of a jet aircraft slightly pointed nose, wings a little swept back. right after i lost sight of the object as it flew slowly behind me i did a u-turn, i was in the far right lane, two lanes on each side of the street so it was a very fast u-turn. the object went from near to far [15+miles in one second and was gone with a faint red streak across the sky and a kinda weak flashbulb effect in the direction it was headed. the event lasted 15-20 seconds. i was stoped and facing west along with another driver stoped as he was driving west when the object flew over. we looked at each other and shruged. this took place last saturday while driving to my brothers house in la crescenta ca from tujunga ca, about 4 miles to catch the last half of the fourth quarter pack ten championship game between oregon and ucla. arround nine pm.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I thought star, helo, then jet and last other. as i was stoped it flew over and i saw what i thought looked like a picture of a jet on the belly of a dark object.While traveling

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on hwy 69 at 7:23pm. (looked at the clock in the car.) there were 2 bright white lights and 1 red light flying very fast and very low from left to right. they were in front of the mountains. the red light and one white light blinked and disappeared, and the remaining white light quickly stopped and stayed in one place for at least a full minute. i had to turn off the highway, so i don't know how long it stayed in that position after it was out of my sight.
content.summary: 2 bright white lights and one red light traveling unnaturally.

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming home from work. i always look to the north west of where i live because i always see the lights in  the sky there.  there were 3 light up in the sky when i looked.  i looked back at the road then back up to the lights and they were gone. when i made it home i went and got my camera.  i decide to try to take a photo or video of them.  the lights go on, then they went out. then they would come on in another area of the same north west sky.  they always do. i took some video of them for about 3 hours off and on.
i knew what the lights were.  the lights was not airplanes, i could see the airplanes fly by where the lights where, because when the plans came by the lights would go out. then come back on when the plane passed. i was excited to see the lights in the sky.  like i said before i always watch for them.
i finally gave up watching and went to bed about 10 p.M.
content.summary: I watched the lights for about 3 hours and video tape it too.  i see the lights all the time during the  fall, winter and spring months the

content.detailedDescription:
I saw this ufo entity in 1993. i love sci-fi movies and tv shows like taken , star trek, close encounters of a third kind. but each time i see these types of shows nothing reflects the alien entity that i saw. 

i was at the (2 location moved to fi box) cms 12/11/11 07:43 cst flg in paradise valley. i was a house guest the owner geordie hormel produce or funded phoenix lights. i was not involved in any way with the people he hired to do the project. i was  (3 name moved to fi box) cms 12/11/11 07:43 cst flg junior high school friend geordie's wife. there house is approx 54,000 foot mansion. it's the ( 1 location moved to fi box) cms 12/11/11 07:43 flg in phoenix. it can help you with perspective and location. 

now the good stuff, i was on the second level balcony outside having a cigarette. it was night time. as i looked out over the view of phoenix i saw that there was a balloon hovering close by their 400ft sunroom. when i saw it is was backlight so i only saw the silhouette of it. i thought it was a mylar balloon the ones with the leg that say something like happy graduation, or congrats. so, being i'm a noisy person, and i thought to myself "oh one of these rich people had a party and one of the balloons had flown away. i wanted to see what type of event it was so i fixed my eyes on it. i floated close and closer from the darkness more to the light the mansion emitted(outside lights). it was about 100 feet in the air about 200 ft from me. that is when i noticed the surface of the creature, it was in the shape of butterfly wings that were fixed they were not fluttering, its legs where like chicken legs with 3 toes dangling, the surface of this thing was like raw hide, and the wings were 
exto-skeleton(meaning the bones ran along the perimeter of the wings. i thought to myself "oh please dont scare me", because i knew i was going to see this creature eye to eye.  i turned away and in that same second it create a great suctioning sound like a giant suction vacuum then a car appeared on the street at the source of the sound, which was hard for me to believe after the incident because on that street you can hear car come from miles away in that direction, i looked back and the creature was gone.
the night was still meaning no wind. years after i saw a balloon being tossed around in high winds and it reminded me of that night how this balloon like floating creature was steadily floated towards me. slow, steady.
i never thought about reporting this but i feel i should. i never saw anything like this in ufo reports or the small men creatures i see portrayed in films.I know i saw a live being flying out on the horizon not far from me. if the balloon was picked up by wind i would of seen it because like i said i had the city light lighting up the sky. i have like superman vision i see things from a far. i would of been able to track this balloon. after the sound and what i saw i ran inside, i was scared.
nothing else ever has happened after this.
content.summary: Sighting of a ufo creature

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and one another of my employees witnessed these bizarre events which took place on my companies property from the time from the japan sunami march 11 to the preeceeding supermoon march 19. it first looked like a really bright moon in the close sky that elongated, split in two and started putting on a display of different shapes, right over my cabin. it would come into the forest mid tree level and we have several pictures of it coming thru the cabin window and the end of it formed a perfect human like hand and swiped my brothers face. we have several clear close up pictures then it flashed inside the cabin we have a really bizzarre photo of what happened. the one guy is totally freaked out , he was severly injured and hospitalized for 3 months after being attacked by it in the cabin [all of his front teeth knocked out and a stroke. my brother left vowing to never go back there, but is back there now. they believe it's strong spirits with a very strong electrical energy. one interesting point is that.
we have 176 first hand photos, including the one bizzarre encounter with my brother in the cabin.
they land is a humic bog with a high electromagnetic signature coming from the ground, the are is also called the gateway unincorporated. only 3 photos submitted, it came day or night, it was phenominally bright. no one else in the area that we talked to has ever seen it.
pics taken with a nikon cool pix.
content.shape: Circle,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Unknown
content.summary: High energy entity coming out of the sky and down into the forest, flying all over and make many different shapes, reminds me of something from disney

content.detailedDescription: I was picking up my girlfriend's sister from her house and i had previously read that you can contact aliens through telepathy, so i thought as hard as i could the words "i want to meet you". i exited my vehicle and looked to the stars, but what i saw was much closer. just over one of the houses, i saw a shape start to move. it was about 15-20 feet wide and 10 feet tall. it was a disc and had panels on the bottom that looked a lot like lights. i started to panic and i think they had picked up on it. the ufo was stealthed though, the outline was distinctly moving and it was close enough that i could make out very clearly what it was. the ufo disappeared completely after about 5 visible seconds. it vanished into thin air, i can't believe i blew my one shot at meeting aliens.
content.summary: After an attempt to communicate with ufo's, they responded.

content.detailedDescription: While walking south on my street my son and i observed a strange object moving across the the sky. our initial thought was maybe a blimp, but quickly realized it was not. i managed to take a snapshot with my cellphone. missing is cloudlike mist surrounding object.
content.summary: Cloud like object moving slowly across night sky.
